channel.title: Copying / Pasting text into Whonix-CLI Gateway
channel.description: I'm using a Whonix CLI Gateway, but pasting stuff (like bridges for Tor config) is a nightmare because on Virtualbox without the GUI terminal, you can't copy paste stuff normally, so is there some other way of pasting stuff like bridges or passwords?

item.title: Copying / Pasting text into Whonix-CLI Gateway
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Not that I know. Best explored as per:

Whonix – 17 Nov 21

Information Booster might be Available!

Utilizing other resources to help solve questions/issues unspecific to Whonix ™.

Read full topic
item.source: Copying / Pasting text into Whonix-CLI Gateway

item.title: Copying / Pasting text into Whonix-CLI Gateway
item.dc:creator: zerotwelve002
item.description:
I’m using a Whonix CLI Gateway, but pasting stuff (like bridges for Tor config) is a nightmare because on Virtualbox without the GUI terminal, you can’t copy paste stuff normally, so is there some other way of pasting stuff like bridges or passwords?
